name: RXA_RESPONSE_COB
description: The response Coordination of Benefits (COB) section received from the payer.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_CVG_TYPE
columns.description: Code identifying the type of Other Payer ID (340-7C).

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_QUAL_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code qualifying the Other Payer ID (340-7C).

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_QUAL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_ID
columns.description: A unique ID assigned to the Other Payer.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_PCN
columns.description: A unique ID assigned to each non-primary payer (secondary, tertiary, etc.)

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_CARDH_ID
columns.description: Cardholder ID for this member that is associated with the Payer noted.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_GROUP_ID
columns.description: A unique ID assigned to the cardholder group or employer group by a non-primary payer (secondary, tertiary, etc.)

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_PERS_CODE
columns.description: A unique code assigned by the other payer to a specific person within a family.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_HLP_DSK_PH
columns.description: The phone number for the Other Payer's help desk.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_PAT_REL_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code assigned by the other payer to indicate the relationship of patient to cardholder.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_PAT_REL_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_BEN_EFF_DT
columns.description: The Other Payer's effective date of the patient's benefits.

columns.name: I_OT_PYR_BEN_TR_DT
columns.description: The Other Payer's termination date of the patient's benefits.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
